attributes.action: Relocate 5G mast from residential area - Penrhos Road, Bangor, Gwynedd.
attributes.additional_details:
Too close to residential buildings, 
overbearing, 
appearance too dominating, 
does not fit in with the surroundings,
could cause a blind spot for drivers, causing accidents
attributes.background: We would like a 5G mast that has appeared overnight in our residential area relocated to a less populated area which does not overlook residential property.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about planning permission for local telecommunications infrastructure are a matter for the relevant planning authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
